title: BlackPlastic.co.uk
description: An alternative music blog focused on sharing the best electronic music.

title: Cloudberry Cake Proselytism
description: C86 • indie pop • neo-aco • with love and no full album download.

title: everybody's number one to someone
description: All the singles to top the NME Indie Charts since its launch in 1981.

title: Garage Hangover | The site for '60s garage bands since 2004
description: This site is a work in progress on 1960s garage rock bands.

title: The Hippies Now Wear Black
description: The online accompaniment to a variety of writing projects on the history, culture, politics and practice of British anarcho-punk, 1977-1984.

title: IndieCentralMusic - News
description: The latest news from what’s happening in the indie music world from tour announcements, festival line up reveals and much more!

title: Motown Junkies
description: An unofficial track by track history of Motown: in-depth analysis and discussion of both sides of every Motown single ever released between 1959 and 1988.

title: Popjustice: 100% Solid Pop Music
description: Pop music, the people who make it, and the people who make the people who make it.

title: Synthpop Fanatic
description: Devoted to dark dance music: synthpop, futurepop, darkwave, electro. Songs you hear on a dark, smoky dancefloor.
